what: Extract Data from US Women's Professional Volleyball Websites
title: Extract Data from US Women's Professional Volleyball Websites
text: {provolleyballr} R package provides tools scraping match statistics player data Athletes Unlimited, League One Volleyball (LOVB) Major League Volleyball (MLV) (formerly Pro Volleyball Federation) websites.

title: Extract Data from US Women's Professional Volleyball Websites
text: can install development version provolleyballr GitHub :
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("JeffreyRStevens/provolleyballr")

title: Extract Data from US Women's Professional Volleyball Websites
text: package requires: {selenider} R package web automation Google Chrome browser installed system Active internet connection

title: Extract Data from US Women's Professional Volleyball Websites
code: library(provolleyballr)

title: Extract Data from US Women's Professional Volleyball Websites
text: package includes information LOVB MLV teams:
code: # View available teams lovb_teams #>        name      slug first_year #> 1   Atlanta   atlanta       2025 #> 2    Austin    austin       2025 #> 3   Houston   houston       2025 #> 4   Madison   madison       2025 #> 5  Nebraska  nebraska       2025 #> 6     Omaha     omaha       2025 #> 7 Salt Lake salt-lake       2025 mlv_teams #>           city     mascot              name              slug first_year #> 1      Atlanta       Vibe      Atlanta Vibe      atlanta-vibe       2024 #> 2     Columbus       Fury     Columbus Fury     columbus-fury       2024 #> 3       Dallas      Pulse      Dallas Pulse      dallas-pulse       2026 #> 4 Grand Rapids       Rise Grand Rapids Rise grand-rapids-rise       2024 #> 5         Indy     Ignite       Indy Ignite       indy-ignite       2025 #> 6        Omaha Supernovas  Omaha Supernovas  omaha-supernovas       2024 #> 7      Orlando  Valkyries Orlando Valkyries orlando-valkyries       2024 #> 8    San Diego       Mojo    San Diego Mojo    san-diego-mojo       2024 #> 9        Vegas     Thrill      Vegas Thrill      vegas-thrill       2024

title: Extract Data from US Women's Professional Volleyball Websites
text: Use get_stats() retrieve team individual player statistics particular league: use league-specific functions AU, LOVB, MLV using au_stats(), lovb_stats(), mlv_stats() respectively. player data, AU needs year, LOVB MLV need team name level = "player". get team data LOVB MLV, use lovb_stats() mlv_stats() respectively level = "team".
code: # Get team match statistics for Omaha Supernovas in 2024 get_stats(league = "MLV", team = "Omaha", year = 2025, level = "team") #> # A tibble: 28 × 15 #>     year team  date      opponent result kills assists service_aces blocks   out #>    <int> <chr> <chr>     <chr>    <chr>  <int>   <int>        <int>  <int> <int> #>  1  2025 Omaha 01/10/20… vsAtlan… W         60      56            3     13    48 #>  2  2025 Omaha 01/12/20… atGrand… W         55      47            2      4    38 #>  3  2025 Omaha 01/17/20… atVegas… L         51      48            3     14    42 #>  4  2025 Omaha 01/19/20… vsSan D… L         62      54            1      5    46 #>  5  2025 Omaha 01/24/20… atColum… W         38      34            5      9    24 #>  6  2025 Omaha 01/31/20… vsColum… W         32      31            1     13    26 #>  7  2025 Omaha 02/02/20… atOrlan… L         31      31            2      5    23 #>  8  2025 Omaha 02/06/20… atIndy … W         44      43            4     11    35 #>  9  2025 Omaha 02/08/20… atAtlan… W         54      49            0      9    38 #> 10  2025 Omaha 02/16/20… vsSan D… W         42      39            2     10    28 #> # ℹ 18 more rows #> # ℹ 5 more variables: attack_attempts <int>, hitting_efficiency <dbl>, #> #   digs <int>, digs_per_set <dbl>, sets_played <int>  # Get individual player statistics get_stats(league = "MLV", team = "Omaha", year = 2025, level = "player") #> # A tibble: 15 × 23 #>     year team  number player    sets_played matches_played points points_per_set #>    <int> <chr>  <dbl> <chr>           <dbl>          <dbl>  <dbl>          <dbl> #>  1  2025 Omaha      1 Valentin…          91             28     56           0.62 #>  2  2025 Omaha      4 Vazquez …           1              1      0           0    #>  3  2025 Omaha      5 Nunevill…         101             28    413           4.09 #>  4  2025 Omaha      6 Wait, Ke…          10              6      2           0.2  #>  5  2025 Omaha      8 Cooper, …          76             25    291           3.83 #>  6  2025 Omaha      9 Podraza,…          33             15     24           0.73 #>  7  2025 Omaha     10 Gómez, C…          90             26      0           0    #>  8  2025 Omaha     11 Payne, K…          73             24    203           2.78 #>  9  2025 Omaha     14 Batenhor…          44             17    136           3.09 #> 10  2025 Omaha     17 Awoleye,…          25             11     43           1.72 #> 11  2025 Omaha     20 Holder, …          33             13      0           0    #> 12  2025 Omaha     22 Krause, …          50             22     11           0.22 #> 13  2025 Omaha     23 Hord, Ka…          93             27    191           2.05 #> 14  2025 Omaha     27 Londot, …          46             21    160           3.48 #> 15  2025 Omaha     28 Caffey, …          82             25    173           2.11 #> # ℹ 15 more variables: kills <dbl>, kills_per_set <dbl>, attack_errors <dbl>, #> #   attack_attempts <dbl>, hitting_efficiency <dbl>, assists <dbl>, #> #   assists_per_set <dbl>, service_aces <dbl>, service_aces_per_set <dbl>, #> #   serive_errors <dbl>, service_errors_per_set <dbl>, digs <dbl>, #> #   digs_per_set <dbl>, blocks <dbl>, blocks_per_set <dbl> au_stats(year = 2025) lovb_stats(team = "Omaha", year = 2025, level = "player") mlv_stats(team = "Omaha", year = 2025, level = "player") lovb_stats(team = "Omaha", year = 2025, level = "team") mlv_stats(team = "Omaha", year = 2025, level = "team")

title: Extract Data from US Women's Professional Volleyball Websites
text: package includes five main datasets created group_stats() function using data: player season data AU (2021-2025) player season team match data AU, LOVB, MLV (2024-2025). datasets also directly available download CSV files: au_player_data lovb_player_data lovb_team_data mlv_player_data mlv_team_data

title: Extract Data from US Women's Professional Volleyball Websites

title: Extract Data from US Women's Professional Volleyball Websites
text: year: Season year team: Player’s team name number: Player jersey number player: Player name points: Total Points matches_started: Matches Started sets_started: Sets Started sets_played: Sets Played hitting_efficiency: Attack Efficiency percentage kill_percentage: Kill percentage kills: Kills - successful attacks attack_errors: Attack Errors attacks_blocked: Attacks blocked opponent attack_attempts: Total attack attempts in_system_percentage: -system percentage reception_errors: Reception errors reception_attempts: Reception attempts service_aces: Service Aces - serves result directly point service_errors: Service errors opponent_in_system_percentage: Opponent -system percentage service_attempts: Service attempts blocks: Blocks - successful defensive plays net block_touch_percentage: Block touch percentage digs: Digs - successful defensive plays dig_percentage: Dig percentage assists: Assists - sets lead directly kill setting_efficiency: Setting efficiency percentage

what: Athletes Unlimited Individual Player Statistics — au_player_data
title: Athletes Unlimited Individual Player Statistics — au_player_data
text: dataset containing individual player season statistics Athletes Unlimited (UA) players 2021-2025 seasons.

title: Athletes Unlimited Individual Player Statistics — au_player_data
code: au_player_data

title: Athletes Unlimited Individual Player Statistics — au_player_data
text: data frame 220 rows 25 variables: year Season year rank Player rank player Player name points Total points achieved sets_played Sets played kills Kills - successful attacks kills_per_set Kills per set attack_errors Attack Errors attack_attempts Total attack attempts kill_percentage Kill percentage assists Assists - sets lead directly kill assists_per_set Assists per set setting_errors Setting errors service_aces Service Aces - serves result directly point service_errors Service errors service_aces_per_set Service aces per set total_reception_attempts Total reception attempts reception_errors Reception errors positive_reception_percentage Percentage reception attempts either positive perfect digs Digs - successful defensive plays digs_per_set Digs per set blocks Blocks - successful defensive plays net blocks_per_set Blocks per set block_assists Block assists - two- three-person blocks good_receptions Number positive receptions

title: Athletes Unlimited Individual Player Statistics — au_player_data
text: https://auprosports.com/volleyball

what: Extract Data from Athletes Unlimited Volleyball Website — au_stats
title: Extract Data from Athletes Unlimited Volleyball Website — au_stats
text: function scrapes player season statistics Athletes Unlimited Volleyball (AU) players official AU website https://auprosports.com/volleyball.

title: Extract Data from Athletes Unlimited Volleyball Website — au_stats
code: au_stats(year = NULL, stored = TRUE)

title: Extract Data from Athletes Unlimited Volleyball Website — au_stats
text: year numeric value specifying year retrieve statistics. Must 2024 later LOVB MLV 2021 later AU. stored logical specifying whether use stored data previous years (TRUE default) force function scrape website (FALSE)

title: Extract Data from Athletes Unlimited Volleyball Website — au_stats
text: tibble containing team player season statistics. Player data include: year, rank, player, points, sets_played, kills, kills_per_set, attack_errors, attack_attempts, kill_percentage, assists, assists_per_set, setting_errors, service_aces, service_errors, service_aces_per_set, total_reception_attempts, reception_errors, positive_reception_percentage, digs, digs_per_set, blocks, blocks_per_set, block_assists, good_receptions

title: Extract Data from Athletes Unlimited Volleyball Website — au_stats
text: function requires: {selenider} R package web automation Google Chrome browser installed system active internet connection function uses headless Chrome browser session, browser window visible execution. Browser sessions automatically closed data extraction.

title: Extract Data from Athletes Unlimited Volleyball Website — au_stats
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() # Get 2025 player statistics au_stats(year = 2025) }

what: Extract Data from US Women's Professional Volleyball Websites — get_stats
title: Extract Data from US Women's Professional Volleyball Websites — get_stats
text: function scrapes team match--match player season statistics Athletes Unlimited (UA), League One Volleyball (LOVB), Major League Volleyball (MLV) players teams official websites.

title: Extract Data from US Women's Professional Volleyball Websites — get_stats
code: get_stats(league = NULL, team = NULL, year = NULL, level = NULL, stored = TRUE)

title: Extract Data from US Women's Professional Volleyball Websites — get_stats
text: league character string specifying league retrieve. Must "AU", "LOVB" "MLV". team character string specifying team name city. Accepts city names (e.g., "Omaha", "Atlanta") variations like "Indianapolis" (converted "Indy") "Las Vegas" (converted "Vegas"). Must match one valid LOVB MLV team cities. AU teams. year numeric value specifying year retrieve statistics. Must 2024 later LOVB MLV 2021 later AU. level character string specifying whether extract "team" individual "player" statistics. AU team statistics. stored logical specifying whether use stored data previous years (TRUE default) force function scrape website (FALSE)

title: Extract Data from US Women's Professional Volleyball Websites — get_stats
text: tibble containing team match--match player season statistics.

title: Extract Data from US Women's Professional Volleyball Websites — get_stats
text: function requires: {selenider} R package web automation Google Chrome browser installed system active internet connection function uses headless Chrome browser session, browser window visible execution. Browser sessions automatically closed data extraction.

title: Extract Data from US Women's Professional Volleyball Websites — get_stats
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() # Get Omaha Supernovas 2024 match statistics get_stats(league = "AU", year = 2025) get_stats(league = "LOVB", team = "Austin", year = 2025, level = "team") get_stats(league = "LOVB", team = "Austin", year = 2025, level = "player") get_stats(league = "MLV", team = "Omaha", year = 2024, level = "team") get_stats(league = "MLV", team = "Omaha", year = 2024, level = "player") }

what: Get Statistics for All Teams in a League — group_stats
title: Get Statistics for All Teams in a League — group_stats
text: function retrieves statistics teams specified league (LOVB MLV) year(s).

title: Get Statistics for All Teams in a League — group_stats
code: group_stats(league = NULL, year = NULL, level = NULL, stored = TRUE)

title: Get Statistics for All Teams in a League — group_stats
text: league character string specifying league retrieve. Must "AU", "LOVB" "MLV". year numeric value specifying year retrieve statistics. Must 2024 later LOVB MLV 2021 later AU. level character string specifying whether extract "team" individual "player" statistics. AU team statistics. stored logical specifying whether use stored data previous years (TRUE default) force function scrape website (FALSE)

title: Get Statistics for All Teams in a League — group_stats
text: data frame containing statistics teams specified league year(s). structure depends league level: MLV team-level: Team match statistics MLV player-level: Individual player statistics LOVB team-level: Team match statistics LOVB player-level: Individual player statistics

title: Get Statistics for All Teams in a League — group_stats
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() # Get all team statistics for both leagues au_team_data <- group_stats(league = "AU", year = 2021:2025) lovb_team_data <- group_stats(league = "LOVB", year = 2025, level = "team") lovb_player_data <- group_stats(league = "LOVB", year = 2025, level = "player") mlv_team_data <- group_stats(league = "MLV", year = 2024:2025, level = "team") mlv_player_data <- group_stats(league = "MLV", year = 2024:2025, level = "player") }

what: Extract Data from League One Volleyball Website — lovb_stats
title: Extract Data from League One Volleyball Website — lovb_stats
text: function scrapes team match--match player season statistics League One Volleyball (LOVB) teams official LOVB website https://www.lovb.com.

title: Extract Data from League One Volleyball Website — lovb_stats
code: lovb_stats(team = NULL, year = NULL, level = NULL)

title: Extract Data from League One Volleyball Website — lovb_stats
text: team character string specifying team name city. Accepts city names (e.g., "Omaha", "Atlanta") variations like "Indianapolis" (converted "Indy") "Las Vegas" (converted "Vegas"). Must match one valid LOVB MLV team cities. AU teams. year numeric value specifying year retrieve statistics. Must 2024 later LOVB MLV 2021 later AU. level character string specifying whether extract "team" individual "player" statistics. AU team statistics.

title: Extract Data from League One Volleyball Website — lovb_stats
text: tibble containing team match--match player season statistics. Team match data include: year, team, opponent, date, points, hitting_efficiency, kill_percentage, kills, attack_errors, attacks_blocked, attack_attempts, in_system_percentage, reception_errors, reception_attempts, service_aces, service_errors, opponent_in_system_percentage, service_attempts, blocks, block_touch_percentage, digs, dig_percentage, assists, setting_efficiency Player data include: year, team, number, player, points, matches_started, sets_started, sets_played, hitting_efficiency, kill_percentage, kills, attack_errors, attacks_blocked, attack_attempts, in_system_percentage, reception_errors, reception_attempts, service_aces, service_errors, opponent_in_system_percentage, service_attempts, blocks, block_touch_percentage, digs, dig_percentage, assists, setting_efficiency

title: Extract Data from League One Volleyball Website — lovb_stats
text: function requires: {selenider} R package web automation Google Chrome browser installed system active internet connection function uses headless Chrome browser session, browser window visible execution. Browser sessions automatically closed data extraction.

title: Extract Data from League One Volleyball Website — lovb_stats
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() # Get Omaha Supernovas 2024 match statistics lovb_stats(team = "Omaha", year = 2025, level = "team") lovb_stats(team = "Omaha", year = 2025, level = "player") }
